[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@loopback/express](./express.md) &gt; [ExpressServer](./express.expressserver.md) &gt; [url](./express.expressserver.url.md)

## ExpressServer.url property

The base url for the server, including the basePath if set. For example, the value will be 'http://localhost:3000/api' if `basePath` is set to '/api'.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get url(): string | undefined;
```
